__e: It's funny, this afternoon... I was watching you... and watching you watching the Murphys' kids... and I thought about how happy we are and how much we have... and then I thought about the Murphys and how happy they are... and I think we could be...

It's funny, this afternoon... I was watching you... and watching you watching the Murphys' kids... and I thought about how happy we are and how much we have... and then I thought about the Murphys and how happy they are... and I think we could be...
Because it didn't really seem to be about Mr. Murphy and it wasn't funny.
Dr. Murphy told me about you.
Murphy told me you let her run with that baby from the trauma.
And Mrs. Murphy wanted me to see if you needed anything.
Mr Murphy doesn't see himself as a son of a bitch.
Murphy's not going anywhere, and we're not leaving him here.
That's why I'm here to see Dr. Murphy and not you.
